title: Interpretation of seeing urinating in a dream or dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about urinating in a dream for Ibn Sirint. Urinating in a dream indicates weakness. The dreamer must examine himself in reality. Perhaps it indicates economic profit. So I will see you soon. But if one sees someone urinating in front of him in a dream, the dream indicates that this person will help the dreamer. Who knows? Polyherism is widespread in The dream indicates that the dreamer feels terrified for his money or for losing his position. The meaning of seeing urine in a dream: When someone dreams of it, he has angered himself, choked his clothes, and become wet, and this is evidence of his feeling of loneliness, the suffering of society, and his lack of adaptation to others. Perhaps the dream indicates that the dreamer is spending his money without taking account of it. It may indicate To the dreamer’s lack of interest. Healthy. The meaning of seeing the bed wet in a woman’s dream. Seeing urine in a woman’s dream generally symbolizes abundant money and its quantity is determined by the amount of urine you saw in the dream. Women Married / Married When she dreams that she is urinating in her bedroom and on her bed in a dream, this indicates that she will give birth to a child Male. As for the unmarried girl, who sees herself urinating on her bed indicates that she will throw out the problems that she is suffering from. It may indicate marriage to a good man. As for the pregnant woman who - who is Tsurism in the mosque or sees her husband doing this, this is a sign from God Almighty that she will give birth to a son or daughter. A good girl for her. Interpretation of a dream about urinating for a single man For a married man, in general, when a man dreams that he is urinating on his bed, this is a good vision. It announces freedom to prisoners. It indicates the payment of the debtor’s debts. It indicates relief after distress and suffering. As for a single man, it is a sign that he is thinking about marriage. For a married man, his skin benefits his pregnant wife, his love and devotion to her. The meaning of seeing urine in a dream in Nabulsiman. He sees that he is urinating for a son, and he will return to lawful livelihood. As for whoever dreams of urinating very hot or with fire, it is an indication of the birth of a boy who will have a great relationship between people in the future. Add the dream that you would like to interpret by referring to the marital status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of the death of a person in a dream and a dream about the death of a living person

preview.html: Seeing the death of a person in a dream symbolizes good news, goodness, and longevity if he does not cry or mourn. As for the death of a living person and crying over him in a dream, this means that he has fallen into a calamity and a misfortune. The death of a loved one means loss and abandonment, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the death of a person in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interprets seeing the death of a person in a dream as good news for the dreamer if he does not appear to be dead or sick, and whoever finds a dead person in a dream will find a lot of money and goodness, and dreaming of the death of a living person and his return to life indicates his sincere repentance from sins and major sins, and seeing the death of a living relative in a dream indicates that a person has stopped working and living. Al-Nabulsi says: Seeing the death of a known person while laughing in a dream indicates his good condition, and whoever sees an unknown person dying well in a dream, this indicates justice in the religion of the dreamer, and whoever sees that he dies in a good way in a dream, this indicates his good conclusion. The death of a slave and praying for him in a dream indicates a heartless reproach, and whoever sees that he is carrying a corpse in a dream, he carries the rulings of someone who has no religion, and whoever carries a corpse. A corpse without a description of the deceased borrowing in a dream, he will get forbidden money, and the dream of carrying a dead person in a funeral indicates serving the Sultan. Seeing the death of a naked person in a dream indicates the poverty and bad condition of that person. Whoever sees someone dying in his bed in a dream, this indicates that he will reach a high position and benevolence. Gustav Miller says: If you see someone you know dead in a dream, this indicates an upcoming calamity or sadness, and whoever hears that a friend or relative has died in a dream, this means that bad news came from him, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a living person by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi said: Seeing the death of a living person in a dream means achieving joy and goodness if it is without tears. And whoever sees himself crying and slapping the death of a person while he is alive in a dream, this indicates bad conditions and corruption in religion, and the death of parents while they are alive in a dream indicates the difficulty of life and bad conditions. The dream of the death of children indicates the interruption of the vision of the seer. Whoever sees in a dream the death of a familiar person while he is alive, he is one of his relatives or family who dies if he cries and screams with him, and he dreams of the death of one of his acquaintances without crying and screaming. It indicates that he will achieve joy and happiness and perhaps his marriage. The death of a king in a dream is evidence of the weakness of his army, and the dream of the death of an old man in a dream indicates the emergence of heresy in religion, and seeing the death of a merchant in a dream indicates a great loss, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a person and crying over him Seeing the death of a person and crying over him in a dream means that you have fallen into calamities and crises. And whoever sees that he is screaming loudly over the death of a person in a dream, he falls into a great trial and error, according to the scholar Ibn Sirin, sadness and consolation. The death of a friend and crying over him in a dream means that he has fallen into distress and needs help, and whoever sees that he is crying over the death of his enemy in a dream, this indicates his liberation from evil and evil. Seeing the death of your sister in a dream means the disintegration of partnerships and the termination of contracts and jobs, and if you see yourself crying over the death of your brother in a dream, this means

And whoever sees that he is crying out loud over the death of a person in a dream, he will fall into great trial and error, according to the scholar Ibn Sirin, grief and consolation. The death of a friend and crying over him in a dream means that he has fallen into distress and is in need of help. And whoever sees that he is crying over the death of his enemy in a dream, this indicates his freedom from evil and wickedness. Seeing the death of your sister in a dream means the disintegration of partnerships and the termination of contracts and jobs, and if you see yourself crying over the death of your brother in a dream, this means

title: Interpretation of seeing cats in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Meaning of a cat in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of the cat attacked me, whether white, black, beautiful, home, single, fear of many small blonde cats, pregnant cats and trying to get them out of the house, pet cat bite. Interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream. Seeing a cat in a dream indicates a soft-spoken person who loves people and has a lot of movement. A cat in a dream denotes friendliness, intimacy, eloquence, and honesty. Seeing a cat in a dream is also interpreted as a beautiful woman admiring herself. If a girl or girl sees that she is carrying a cat in her dream, she will commit an immoral act with her body. If a merchant sees a cat, it means that his competitors are sabotaging his business deals and sabotaging his planning. Seeing a male cat or cats indicates that he is a servant or a thief from the same family. Seeing a female cat is a bad deceitful woman. Whoever sees that he was bitten or scratched by a male cat will be sick for a long time. The more scratches and wounds from him and the stray cat, the more illness and suffering from it. If the cat is a pet, this means A year of comfort and enjoyment. As for whoever sees that he has sold a cat or kitten, he is spending his money without realizing it, and may be afflicted with poverty. Anyone who eats meat never learns magic. Anyone who is attacked by a cat without being scratched is evidence of slander by enemies by distorting your reputation in various ways. Whoever sees a cat in his dream and does not keep it away or does not kill it, then he is dissatisfied, annoyed, and unpopular. Whoever sees that he has never changed, lives a life of eavesdropping, stealing, and spying on others. Whoever sees a cat entering a house, he has entered this house to steal it, or he has a specific purpose in This house. And if he hears a meow or the sound of a cat in a dream, whether he sees it nearby or not, then this indicates a false friend who betrays and harms. If a cat and a mouse or a wolf and a sheep agree, then this is evidence of the hypocrisy and flattery of those around you. Perhaps the cat indicates a woman who She wants to raise children and discipline them if she is seen by a husband or someone who is looking for and waiting for marriage. A cat scratching someone indicates a warring enemy, and sometimes it indicates a person who has evil qualities and shows good morals. If the dream is of a cat and a snake agreeing, this indicates that the person He will use an enemy to achieve his goals and then turn away from them and abandon them after achieving them. As for whoever kills a cat in his dream, he catches a thief. If a cat enters its stomach or swallows a cat, someone will steal it. Interpretation of a dream about a cat - YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about marriage for a married man and woman

preview.html: In the name of God, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful, and may blessings and peace be upon the Master of Creation and the Messengers. Today we meet, my brothers and sisters, on the subject of the interpretation of marriage in a dream or the interpretation of the dream of marriage as mentioned in the interpretation of Ibn Sirin in the chapter on marriage, pregnancy, childbirth and breastfeeding in the book Interpretation of Big Dreams, and this article will be limited to its interpretation: a wedding in a dream for a single, married and pregnant woman, as well as a wedding in A dream for a single person, interpretation of seeing a wedding dress. In a dream with many other topics related to the dream of marriage, a beautiful and useful continuation, God willing. Interpretation of marriage in a dream by Ibn SirinMarriage in a dream is pride, nobility, honor and power, and it is worldly similar to that woman he saw as if he had married her in the dream. Whoever sees in his dream that his wife married someone else, then money and wealth will harm him. Whoever sees in his dream that he is marrying his mother, sister, or a woman with a mother, even if it is in the holy months, then he will step on the Holy Land, and if the marriage is not to the mother or sister. In the holy months, he is connected by kinship or honored immediately after estrangement, and whoever sees that he is marrying a man in his dream, whether he is unknown or a young man who has defeated his enemy, and is he known there by his name. we will. There is no enmity between them, so whoever gets married in a dream benefits. Interpretation of marriage in a dream according to the Islamic approach. Marriage with a high-ranking marriage and a good reputation, without marriage is a new job, and the marriage contract, the Qur’an, the written book, or the dowry in the dream indicates a contract or covenant with God. You marry a famous woman, this indicates success in your goals, a symbol of the world, and if she is a sword, i.e. a widow or divorced, then in your dream it is a good year according to her beauty. If the woman is beautiful or fat, then she is fertile, God willing, and if the woman you married in your dream is ugly or poor, then this indicates a poor, barren year without goodness. As for consanguineous marriage, it is understanding, reconciliation, harmony, intimacy, and love in your environment, your family, or among your friends, unlike incest. Interpretation of a dream about getting married in a dream with honor: If a girl dreams that she is getting married, and she sees in a dream what the bride will get when she gets married, then she will gain good luck and be accepted by good people. And you will get the best or enjoy the best. That happens to a girl. An unmarried woman who sees in her dream that she will get married without seeing the husband she married, then she is about to get engaged or something that will be easy. A girl who gets married in her dream and sees her husband but does not know him is a sign of luck in livelihood and money. Interpretation of marriage in a dream for a married woman: A married woman who sees in her dream that she is marrying someone other than her husband, then she will benefit from the one she married in her dream if she knows him. A married woman who gets married in a dream portends pregnancy or childbirth. The meaning of marriage in a pregnant woman’s dream: Marriage without a husband in a pregnant woman’s dream is good and indicates success in diet, money, and work. For the same husband, whether male or female, and knowledge belongs to God alone. The meaning of marriage in a dream of a divorced woman and a widow. Marriage in a dream of a divorced woman is good, as it means the divorced woman returning to her or marrying someone else, and the widow marrying someone else in her dream.

For the same husband, whether male or female, and knowledge belongs to God alone. The meaning of marriage in a dream of a divorced woman and a widow. Marriage in a dream of a divorced woman is good, as it means the divorced woman returning to her or marrying someone else, and the widow marrying someone else in her dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a vase in a dream

preview.html: A vase means love and passion, and seeing it in a dream has connotations and meanings that we will present during our topic today about men and women. Interpretation of a dream about a vase in a dream for a single woman. A single girl, when she dreams of a vase in a dream, it is a sign of love and passion, and that he will meet a man and fall in love with him and the same feeling will return to him. As for her dreaming of a vase full of roses in her sleep, this It denotes marriage. A vision from a person who communicates, but after a long time of acquaintance. As for the one who dreams that he brought the vase, cleaned it, and filled it with flowers, this is a sign of the girl’s effort and diligence to reach her dreams and goals. A large number of vase in the dream symbolizes the strength of love and friendship between the dreamer, her family, and her entire family. Pink, purple vaseIn a dream, being single is a sign of happy news and getting good newsWeaknessOpportunity.A vase full of white roses in a girl’s dreamFiancéeDuring her sleep, it shows her that her wedding is approaching.The meaning of seeing watering a vase in a dreamAs for what you see, it isWild rosesWhat is in the jar is a sign of the fulfillment of a wish For her, she thought it was difficult. Seeing a vase with flowers of light and bright colors is a sign of hope for food. A black jar shows regret and parting with a lover or breaking off the engagement. Seeing a vase in a dream for a single young man. A vase in a young man’s dream indicates beauty, especially a beautiful woman. Whoever dreams of seeing an ornate vase and its shape The beautiful symbolizes that she proposes to a beautiful girl. The vase in the young man’s dream indicates good luck and good news. When a young man dreams that he is placing a vase of flowers in a library in the dream, it is a sign that he will be promoted and appointed to a new job after working hard and diligently. Seeing roses in a vase indicates On happiness, joy and fulfillment of desires. The meaning of seeing a broken vase in a dream for a young man. When a young man dreams that his vase has been broken in a dream, this is a sign of bad news or bad luck. But if he sees that he is the one who divided it, it symbolizes that he is unable to face his problems. And whoever sees the vase Devoid of roses indicates the introversion in which the dreamer lives. Add the dream that you would like to interpret, indicating the marital status, in a comment below the article, and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing gold in a dream. Discover through the following article the consequences of seeing selling old gold in a dream for unmarried, pregnant and divorced women and learn about the interpretations of selling rings, earrings and gold chains in a dream. Read the following paragraphs. You have a dream that confuses you. You are waiting for it.. Search on Google for the dream interpretation site OnlineSelling gold in a dreamThe dream of selling gold is interpreted based on what type of jewelry the dreamer sold in the dream and what was its weight? Was it old or new?, as follows: Seeing a broken gold ring in a dream: It indicates the end of a failed romantic relationship, liberation from its restrictions and preparation for a new and comfortable relationship. Dreaming of selling heavy gold earrings: It indicates that problems will disappear and may indicate that the dreamer He has abandoned his marital and family role and responsibilities. Seeing a gold necklace that weighs a lot in a dream: indicates liberation from heavy obstacles and burdensome fears. Dreaming of selling golden legs in a dream: It indicates divorce or indicates the dreamer’s liberation and release from prison. Seeing selling a gold pen In a dream: It indicates loss of position, lack of prestige, and abandoning the job of being a spectator in reality. Seeing yourself selling gold in a dream and buying other new pieces of gold jewelry: It interprets that the dreamer may exit a romantic relationship and enter into another relationship, and generally this vision is interpreted as the end of a stage. Bad and sad and the beginning of a happy stage in the dreamer’s life. Selling gold in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing gold in a dream for a single or married woman according to Ibn Shirin means kindness, sustenance and many blessings. Based on the previous interpretation, seeing gold sold in a woman’s dream is evidence of the disappearance of blessings and the increase of distress. He said. Ibn Sirin: Yellow gold is one of the bad symbols that the dreamer dreams of in a dream, as it is interpreted by illness and many difficulties. If yellow gold is sold in a dream, the vision indicates that the illness will subside and anxiety will go away. And if one sees that he is selling gold jewelry that If he wears it in his dream, he chooses his future, sells the world, stops sinning, and repents to God. Selling gold in a dream for an unmarried woman. Interpretation of a dream about selling gold for unmarried women indicates good and promising beginnings, in the event that she sold her wide engagement ring in a dream that was not suitable for her. This is evidence of her separation from her unsuitable fiancé. But if an unmarried woman sells her engagement ring in a dream, knowing that the ring is beautiful and suitable, then the vision is evidence of separation and her engagement will soon be annulled. If an unmarried woman sees black gold and is afraid of it and sells it in a dream, this is evidence of a breakup and her engagement will soon be broken. The disappearance of distress, the emergence of happiness, and the resolution of problems. If an unmarried woman sells white gold in a dream, this is evidence of her bad behavior. She is a foolish girl and will soon lose useful things and may sever her relationship with believers. Selling gold in a dream to a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about selling gold to a married woman may indicate To her poor condition and her large debts. If a married woman sells it

title: Seeing the number 300 in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the number 300 in a dream Seeing numbers in a dream has many connotations between good and evil, and seeing numbers indicates good planning for the future and the dreamer’s participation in achieving his dreams and goals. Happiness and stability. The number 300 in a married woman’s dream. Seeing the number 300 means good luck. It also indicates happiness and stability in married life. Interpretation of a dream about taking 300 pounds. This number indicates the proximity of comfort and loss of neglect and sadness. It also indicates joy and pleasure. Interpretation of dreams 300 kilos. From paper for individuals: Seeing the number 300 in a girl’s dream indicates justice and piety. It also indicates good luck, wealth and success. Interpretation of the number 3000 in a dream: Seeing the number 3000 is a good vision that shows good planning for the future. Seeing this number for a single young man indicates the fulfillment of his dreams and desires. It can indicate It also indicates over-thinking about something important. The number 3000 in a divorced woman’s dream. Seeing the number 3000, 300, or the number 3 in a divorced woman’s dream indicates good luck and the fulfillment of her dreams and desires. It also indicates the end of worry and anxiety. Seeing the number 300 also indicates that she is concerned An important matter. The number 3000 in a pregnant woman’s dream. The number 3000 or its various forms indicates rest after fatigue and the fulfillment of desires. It also indicates the ease of childbirth and the elimination of fatigue and pain. Interpretation of 3000 pounds in a dream. The number 3000 indicates happy news. Seeing that he receives the amount of 3000 pounds may indicate To pleasant surprises and good and praiseworthy things. It also indicates victory over enemies. What is the interpretation of seeing the number 3 in a dream for a single woman? Seeing the number 3 for a single girl shows a determination to achieve her dreams and desires. It indicates a new life and radical changes in her life for the better. Or He joined a new prestigious job. It may indicate that he obtained a master’s degree or doctorate. The number 3 for an unmarried girl indicates the approaching engagement or the approaching marriage if she is engaged. Interpretation of the third hour in a dream for a married man: Seeing the number 3 and its derivatives such as the number 300 and the number 3000 are visions. A good vision that shows the dreamer’s preoccupation with his work and the responsibilities of his home, wife, and children. The vision also indicates success in work and social life. Interpretation of seeing the number 300 in a dream for a young man. Seeing the number 300 for a single young man is a good vision that indicates an excellent future and good luck. Seeing this number and its derivatives indicates excessive effort and activity. To have a safe and stable life and to obtain money through a distinguished job or a profitable investment project. 3 Million Dream InterpretationSeeing numbers are visions that show planning for the future and achieving goals. Seeing and hearing the number one million in a dream means joys and pleasure. It also indicates positive changes and moving to a new stage. Better. Seeing the number one million also indicates an improvement in living and economic conditions. It also indicates a safe and stable life. Interpretation of the number 35 in a dream Seeing the number 35 is a good vision for a girl, which indicates a future life full of joy and very good for the dreamer. The number shows the girl’s engagement and selection

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a severed hand in a dream according to Ibn Sirin about a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams to see a severed hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin for a married woman. His fate in the coming period if these problems continue, and through our article we will provide you with information about the interpretation of cutting off a hand in a dream for a single woman, the interpretation of a dream about seeing a cut off hand in a dream for a married woman, the woman of Ibn Sirin, and what is the interpretation of seeing a hand in a dream and what is the interpretation of a dream about cutting off a hand, my sister. What is the interpretation of cutting off a hand in a dream for a single woman? It is stated in the interpretation of cutting off a hand in a dream for an unmarried woman that seeing a cutting of a hand often does not indicate goodness, and the vision shows that its owner suffers from many problems in her life and cannot achieve the goals she has set. This is successful, as the translator Ibn Shaheen mentioned in the interpretation of the severed hand of an unmarried woman, that it indicates problems and problems in the dreamer’s emotional life.Interpretation of the dream of seeing a severed hand in a dream for a married woman, Ibn Sirin. Shaheen, this vision shows many difficult problems in her married life, and these problems may lead to divorce. Her husband, but if the severed hand in a dream bleeds profusely, this indicates the abundance of money and a lot that will come in this coming period, and if the wife sees in a dream that she used a knife to cut her hand, then this vision appears. The sins committed by the dreamer against God Almighty. What is the interpretation of seeing the palm of the hand in a dream? Al-Nabsali said in his interpretation of seeing the palm of the hand in a dream that it shows the strength of the man and that the things that happen to the palm tree in the dream show the things that will happen to the dreamer in the dream. This world, just as the interpretation of a dream about the palm of the hand is the contraction and relaxation of the hand or the general state in which the hand is like the movements it makes and the appearance of hair on it. There are a number of interpretations of this vision that they are according to the smallest details of this vision and the circumstances in which the dreamer was. What is the interpretation of a dream? Cutting off my sister’s hand? Interpretation of seeing a dream about a cat with my sister’s hand cut off in the dream indicates the severing of kinship ties and also indicates major crises between the family and relatives, and this vision shows the weakness of that person in his rights. God Almighty and the teachings of Islam and prayer are exalted, so the person with this vision should be close to God Almighty in obedience, abstaining from disobedience, observing prayer, and maintaining kinship, so that God Almighty will give him good tidings. In the near future, the situation will improve in the near future, God willing. It is mentioned that the dream of seeing a severed hand is one of the indications of misfortunes that will come to the dreamer or its owner in the coming period, depending on the condition of the dreamer. What is the interpretation of seeing the palm of one’s hand in a dream, and what is the interpretation of a dream about cutting off my sister’s hand?

title: Interpretation of a dream about incest in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about incest in a dream. Scientists have cited many interpretations that express intercourse and foreplay. Below we present the interpretation of a dream about incest in a dream and other details.Interpretation of a dream about incest in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about incest in a dream Seeing adultery with incest can indicate problems And crises, and God knows all that is not seen. When you see sexual intercourse in a dream, it may be a sign of judgments, and God is all-knowing. If the dreamer sees adultery through incest in a dream, this may lead to disputes, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When the dreamer sees incest, this may indicate the severing of kinship ties, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream That my nephew has sex with me in a dreamInterpretation of dreams of my nephew communicating with me in a dream, perhaps it expresses strong relationships, and God knows the unseenSimilarly, if a married woman sees that her sister’s son is getting married with her in a dream, this may represent the strong ties that bind her, and God knows all that It is not seen. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream having intercourse with her sister’s son, she can express advice, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees her sister’s son tying her in a dream, this may be evidence of kinship ties, and God is All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about my uncle contacting me in Dream Interpretation of dreams about my uncle communicating with me in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that, except that seeing intercourse in a dream is not okay, and God knows best. Because seeing intercourse in a dream may indicate illness or difficult problems, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Also, seeing incest can indicate difficult disputes and that God He has all the knowledge. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-husband having sex with me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife having sex with me in a dream. It could be a sign of remorse for divorce, and God knows best. When a divorced woman sees her ex-wife having sex with her in a dream, this may lead to the possibility of her returning to him, and God knows best. I know. If a divorced woman sees in a dream intercourse with her ex-husband, this may be evidence of the possibility of solving problems, and God knows the unseen. It can also be a sign of new beginnings, and God knows all unseen things. Interpretation of dreams that I was in contact with a divorced woman in a dream. Interpretation Dreaming of my mother having sex with a divorced woman in a dream, perhaps this will lead to reconciliation between them, and God knows best. If a married man sees sexual intercourse with a divorced woman, he can express her return to her ex-husband, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When a divorced woman sees sexual intercourse with her husband in a dream, this may be evidence of her return, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees sexual intercourse with a man she knows in a dream, this may represent mutual benefit and work, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that I was in contact with my best friend in a dream. I dreamed that I was in contact with my colleague in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing a female colleague in a dream could be evidence of the actions carried out by the dreamer, and God knows best. When the dreamer sees a female colleague who is angry with him, this may lead to problems at work, and God is Most High.
